title: Workshop on Utilizing Learning Design Tools in Mobile Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational digital literacy and language learning experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening competency in using design tools for language learning in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Participants can visualize (dis)connections between elements (relationships, concepts, tools) of language learning design using the ACAD Toolkit
Participants can analyze consistency/inconsistencies in existing language education designs through reflective practice and propose improvements
Participants can construct an effective language learning activity design framework within mobile learning constraints (smartphone optimization, microlearning)

resources: Language Learning Video for Case Analysis (5 minutes or less)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
